review: It's difficult to select photo albums to view, since every single directory is shown.  It would be better if you could go into a directory then subdirectories. For example, one may want to quickly find the Holidays directory, then Thanksgiving and finally the year.  The same could be said for People, then Family, then kids.
author: J. Sanctus-Filius "Johannes"

review: Overall a great device. I had some problems with the network connection initially before I used the extender - this is somewhat understandable as our wireless Ethernet is quite far away from our TV. What could have been much better though is the error message we received - "Connected with Problems" is not the least actionable! Instead there should have been instructions telling us about the extender and how to "reboot" the device.
author: Mikael Horal

review: I picked up 2 of these during the pre-order sale. THEY ARE AMAZING!Instant access to Hulu, Netflix and obviously all the great media Prime has to offer.Not to mention all the apps you can install on this little thing. I have my plex running perfectly on it.I will never play games on it, so i can't comment on that, but the option is there.Roku is to slow and Chromecast doesn't even compare.i don't think you can beat this thing for $40. let alone the $19 i paid for them.
